data.name: Crows Crows Crows (Disable Email Sign-Up)
data.description: This just hides away the Email Sign-Up at the bottoms of most links on the Crows Crows Crows website, such as the fake email reports.

data.name: Aternos Green Theme
data.description: Another theme made by me, ScreeZ. Hope you enjoy it, and as always, please let me knwo if there are any "bugs" with the theme, or maybe something i've missed.

data.name: Wrike - (Dark) Fully Color Based on theme
data.description:
When switching your wrike theme, this uses the colors to call all the panels.
This theme works best on the themes with the dark colors as the text is a light #CCC

- fixed - Some of the color may be hard-coded to a purple hue, working on that. sorry
- gnatt charts are rendered on a canvas with javascript, not sure where to get colors here, so an invert and opacity change
- 7/25/19 - updated more nested menus, and more areas i found i missed. seems a new style went in to place so touched that up to.
-01/02/20 - fixed some inverted colors and a few missing panels.

data.name: FRITZ!Box Dark [ OS 7.12+ ]
data.description:
A dark Theme for FritzBox with OS 7.12 or greater. 
This is an update for the Original FRITZ!Box Dark Theme by EotT [ https://userstyles.org/users/383856 ]
